activate().return: A boolean indicating if the activation has completed successfully.

params.numberOfTokens: The number of tokens the sender wants to buy.

buyTokens(uint256).return: A boolean value indicating if the purchase has completed successfully.

deactivate().return: A boolean indicating if the deactivation has completed successfully.

getBalanceOf(address).return: The number of tokes bought by the given address.

getEndTimestamp().return: The timestamp when the sale will end.

getOwner().return: The address of the owner of the private sale.

getRedeemableAfterTimestamp().return: The timestamp when the tokens will be redeemable.

getStartTimestamp().return: The timestamp when the sale will begin.

getStatus().return: The current status of the contract.

getTokensMaxCap().return: The maximum cap of the tokens.

getTokensMinCap().return: The minimum cap of the tokens.

reallocateTokens().return: A boolean indicating if the reallocation has completed successfully.

redeemTokens().return: A boolean value indicating if the retrieval of the tokens has completed successfully.

refundTokens().return: A boolean value indicating if the refund has completed successfully.

getBalanceOf(address).notice: A getter function for the current balance of an address.

getEndTimestamp().notice: A getter function for sale's ending timestamp.

getOwner().notice: A getter function for the owner of the private sale.

getRedeemableAfterTimestamp().notice: A getter function for timestamp after which the tokens will be redeemamble.

getStartTimestamp().notice: A getter function for sale's starting timestamp.

getStatus().notice: A getter function for contract's status.

getTokenPrice().notice: A getter function for the price of the token.

getTokensMaxCap().notice: A getter function for the maximum cap of the tokens.

getTokensMinCap().notice: A getter function for the minumum cap of the tokens.

getTokensSold().notice: A getter function for the number of tokens sold.

reallocateTokens().notice: Reallocates the remaining tokens and the raised ether (if the sale has completed successfully) back to admin.

redeemTokens().notice: Redeems sender's token when sale has completed.

refundTokens().notice: Refunds sender's tokens when sale has failed.
